alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 23 at 12:20AM PDT until March 24 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL 8 AM PDT FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sustained west to northwest winds 20 to 30 mph, with gusts near 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert Slopes. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon until 8 AM Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 178 below Walker Pass, including the town of Inyokern and Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
